arabic_text: وَمِنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ مَن يَغُوصُونَ لَهُۥ وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَلٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ وَكُنَّا لَهُمۡ حَٰفِظِينَ
translation: (82) And of the devils [i.e., jinn] were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.[898]
footnotes: [898]- Preventing any disobedience or deviation by them from Solomon's instructions and protecting him from being harmed by them.
